# SerophanÂ®

## Description
A 5-HTP supplement intended to support serotonin production for mood balance and deeper sleep.

## Site structure

### Homepage (/)
- Overview of serotonin's role in mood and sleep, and why 5-HTP is used as a precursor
- Serotonin gap quiz to help assess daytime mood and nighttime sleep patterns
- Explanation of the serotonin-to-melatonin connection surfaced in the quiz results
- Product information, dosage options (200 mg, 400 mg), and purchasing

### Quality portal (/quality/coa)
- Batch number or QR code lookup for certificates of analysis
